title: Support main looking for duo adc
body:
I main support with:  {{champion:89}} /{{champion:12}} /{{champion:53}} /{{champion:201}} /{{champion:111}} /{{champion:412}} 
Yes I'm in B5, looking to escape as I can't carry as well as I support so ideally a duo partner would be great!
Someone with skype/TS/vent would be ideal aswell (easy to talk to whilst in-game).


Post here then add me in game: Dial711forHELP

replies.body: I'll play with you, im on right now
add me on my bronze acc Manphite
}lol I fucking need this draven and mundo skin they look hectic and I main them{{summoner:4}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:141:}}
i dnt pali adc but i wil liek tu clmb wtih yu plz.
